ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: Resource State
ygData.msgSnippet: Sessions and statelessness aren t mutually exclusive, so long as the session in which the message exists is part of the message.  That makes the *interaction*

X-Yahoo-Group-Post: public

Sessions and statelessness aren't mutually exclusive, so long as the
session in which the message exists is part of the message.  That makes
the *interaction* stateless, which is the important thing.

MB
